messages.subject: David Albert's Southern California Speaking Tour
messages.msgSnippet: Homeschooler author, speaker, and magazine columnist David Albert will be on a speaking tour of Southern California May 10th thru 15th. He is the author of
messages.messageBody:
Homeschooler author, speaker, and magazine columnist David Albert will
be on a speaking tour of Southern California May 10th thru 15th. He is
the author of Homeschooling and the Voyage of Self-Discovery, And the
Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in Homeschooling and Community-Based
Education, and the forthcoming "Have Fun. Learn Stuff. Grow."
Homeschooling and the Curriculum of Love", and writes the columns
"What Really Matters" in The Link and "My Word!" in Home Education
Magazine.

Times and topics will be different at each location. For more
information, write or call the local contacts, as below: (reservations
in advance appreciated)

Tuesday, May 10th, Afternoon: Santa Clarita. Contact Vicky Frangos,
live2learninscv@..., 661 513-9966

Tuesday, May 10th, Evening: Thousand Oaks/Conejo Valley. Contact Sue
Jackson, sudajaka@..., 818 707 3019

Wednesday, May 11: Monrovia. Contact Martin & Carolyn Forte,
EIEinformation@..., 616 821-0025

Thursday, May 12: Huntington Beach. Contact Bequi Howarth,
bequi@..., 714 423-5935

Friday: May 13th: Temecula. Contact Joana Johnson,
johnsonjoana@..., 951 506-2623

Saturday, May 14th, San Diego. Contact Tiffany Monticino,
califmom@..., 619 821-0025

Folks are welcome to contact me and I'll try to provide more info. if
I have it.

david
